database.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_plugin}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `globalId` VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, `pageId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `status` INT(10) NOT NULL, `urlTitle` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, `title` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, `description` TEXT NOT NULL, `rateUp` INT(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `rateDown` INT(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `releaseDate` DATETIME NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `globalId` (`globalId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_plugin_maintainer}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `pluginId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `pluginUserId` (`pluginId`,`userId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_plugin_release}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `globalId` VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, `pluginId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `status` ENUM('STABLE','BETA','ALPHA') NOT NULL, `version` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, `href` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

INSERT INTO `{table.amun_user_activity_template}` (`type`, `verb`, `table`, `path`, `summary`) VALUES ('INSERT', 'add', 'amun_service_plugin_release', 'view?id={record.id}', '

{user.name} has released version {record.version} ({record.status})
